ygData.subject: Hakibuscon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hakibuscon kept crawling.  He couldn t feel anything but pain.  He kept crawling.  He had to find someone, somewhere, something, anything.  He had to live,

::Hakibuscon::

        Hakibuscon kept crawling.  He couldn't feel anythin=
g but pain.  He kept crawling.  He had to find someone, somewhere, somethin=
g, anything.  He had to live, he couldn't die now.  Suddenly, a tree broke =
somehow, and fell on top of him.  NOOOOOO!!!!!!  *THUD!*  *BANG!*  *CRASH!*=
  He was still alive.  But in critical condition.  His wounds were now fata=
l.  He could already see his life coming to an end.  He tried to crawl out =
from under the tree.  He did, but now, he was missing his bottom half, his =
legs and torso, and he was missing an arm.  His circuits were malfunctionin=
g.  He was a goner.  He looked around.  Nobody could help him......Nobody.
=

       With everything left in him, he screamed out, "HEEELP MEEEEEEEEEEEE=
EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
!!!!!!!
